entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Debug Console" doesn't seem to support spans with slices #68753
  • ExportCodeFixProviderAttribute should be marked as `Inherted = false` #68751
  • LSIF indexing performance degraded #68750
  • ILVerification fails unexpectedly on method group conversion using extension method #68749
    C# 12.0
  • ObservableProperty breaks ExtractInterfaceCodeRefactoringProvider #68748
  • IDE0059 should not trigger when fixing it triggers BC42104 #68746
  • The `language` property of the SARIF file should be output correctly #68745
  • C# DevKit complains about ref structs #68742

Closed

  • Intellisense not work with interface #68594

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection literals: remove DictionaryElementSyntax #68752
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • "Fix" LSP semantic token modifiers #68744
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Rename CollectionCreationExpression to CollectionExpression #68747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix collection literal parsing at the state of a statement expression. #68737
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Return correctly formatted URIs for file watching #68741
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68635
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, Next
  • Collection literals: type inference #68703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Publish additional package for razor testing #68725
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Don't expose MS.VS.LanguageServer.Protocol types from EA.Razor #68713
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Crossgen for .NET 8 #68721
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes - post VS2019.md #68674
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • EnC: Implement support for editing types with primary constructors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Fix assert when using `__arglist` and `in` arguments together #68726
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Readonly References, untriaged
